{"id":937936824,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1682175582,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/937936824/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Additions to Make Valid String","memory":"42.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int addMinimum(String word) {\n        int idx1=0;\n        int ans=0;\n        int idx2=0;\n        String str=\"abc\";\n        while(idx2<word.length()){\n            if(word.charAt(idx2)==str.charAt(idx1)){\n                idx2++;\n                idx1=(idx1+1)%3;\n            }\n            else{\n                idx1=(idx1+1)%3;\n                ans++;\n            }\n\n        }\n        idx2=word.length()-1;\n        if(word.charAt(idx2)=='a'){\n            ans+=2;\n        }\n        if(word.charAt(idx2)=='b'){\n            ans+=1;\n        }\n        //ans+=(2-idx1);\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-additions-to-make-valid-string","has_notes":false}
